name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sure Or Not - News Date Validator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share news responsibily to your Facebook feed, highlights when an outdated article is shown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SureOrNot provides you with a heads up if you are reading an outdated news article on your Facebook feed to fight Fake News. Some outdated news are often shared again due to the controversy it brings or to create tensions.
